branchCategory.name: XLFV, Aluminum High Vacuum Angle Valve, Normally Closed, O-ring Seal with Solenoid Valve
branchCategory.description: <p>Series XLFV is a high vacuum angle valve for use in industrial applications employing high vacuum and process gases.&nbsp; Common industries that may use this angle valve include semiconductor, solar and other electronics production, as well as food and pharmaceutical manufacturing.&nbsp; The XLFV valves are single-acting, normally closed.&nbsp; The spring an shaft are exposed to gas flow, but a scraper and O-ring seal the piston pressure volume from process gases.&nbsp; The XLFV opens when pressure is applied at the pilot port, which is controlled by a body mounted solenoid valve.&nbsp; The valve body is hard anodized A6063 aluminum, with 304 stainless steel valves and an electroless nickel plated steel spring.&nbsp; The XLFV bellows are 316L stainless steel.&nbsp; Numerous seal material are available for a wide range of chemical compatibility.</p>

breadCrumb.name: XLFV, Aluminum High Vacuum Angle Valve, Normally Closed, O-ring Seal with Solenoid Valve
